definitions.structures.euclidean.functionspaces.impl

Class FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • definitions.structures.euclidean.vectorspaces.impl.FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace
      • definitions.structures.euclidean.functionspaces.impl.FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlPrintable, Group, Monoid, SemiGroup, FunctionSpace, InnerProductSpace, MetricSpace, NormedSpace, VectorSpace, VectorSpaceMethods, EuclideanFunctionSpace, EuclideanSpace, Unweavable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiniteDimensionalSobolevSpace, PolynomialFunctionSpace, TrigonometricSpace

    public class FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace
extends FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace
implements EuclideanFunctionSpace
    Author:
    RoManski Concrete implementation of a finite dimensional function space.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
